elements.name: Just Dance: Blinding ligths
elements.description:
A video inspired from the game Just Dance , created for a show in my university. The song is Blinding ligths by The Weeknd.
  • Software: After Effects, Blender (Eeeve) and Premiere Pro
  • Date: 03/2022
  • Time spent: 2 weeks approx.

elements.name: VFX Statues
elements.description:
3D reconstruction of people. Before being textured, the faces were reconstructed using photogrammetry, while the hairs and the bodies were hand-made in Blender.
  • Software: Photoshop, Blender (Cycles) and Premiere Pro
  • Date: 12/2021
  • Time spent: 3 weeks approx.

elements.name: Sequence shot VFX
elements.description:
Some VFX applied to a sequence shot.
  • Software: Blender (Cycles) and Premiere Pro
  • Date: 04/2021
  • Time spent: 3 days
